item.description: This is a two part series to watch a conversation with Jack Kornfield and Pema Chodron on Wisdom and Compassion. These two veteran teachers present their views from two different Buddhist paths, exploring differences and similarities behind their teachings. Their message is clear and informative, providing insights into the two wings of Buddhism that give it flight. Please join us in mindfulness over the next two Mondays to watch this excellent video. We'll have time to share insights and epiphanies, sit in short meditation, and discuss our thoughts and impressions after watching the video.
item.how_to_find_us: We're on the right side of the building through the black wrought iron gateway.
item.name: Video with Jack Kornfield and Pema Chodron: Wisdom and Compassion
